resources.string:
At first you have to add at least one place in your placelist.
 Click the green plus button and navigate to your desired place.
 When your pin is at the desired position on the map, click the green button at the bottom of your screen, give it a name and save it.

 Then, you can click on a place in your placelist, and type a note.
 By clicking ok, you are all set.
 A notification will pop-up when you arrive at this particular place.

 Have fun :D
Are you sure you want to delete all places?\nThis cannot be undone.
Your placelist is empty.\n\nClick here or the plus button, and add your first place.
Are you sure you want to delete this note?
Are you sure you want to delete all notes?\nThis cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to remove %1$s ?
Address unavailable. \nSlow Internet connection might be the issue.
Approximate location found Check your location settings for better accuracy
